info.task: navigate backwards to expanded disclosure button
info.title: Navigate backwards to an expanded disclosure button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstLinkInDropdown
setupScript.description: sets the state of the first disclosure button to expanded, and sets focus on the first link of the associated dropdown

user: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the navigation region. Note: it should be in the expanded state.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the navigation region. Note: it should be in the expanded state.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: State of the button (expanded) is conveyed
